Name: Library
Text: You enter a vast library. a dozen rows of bookshelves bend under the weight of hundreds of old tomes. A writing desk is pressed against the wall on the far end of the room.

Name: Writing Desk
Text: A few ink pads, vials and a feather. A few empty scrolls and... a scibble of a clock. The hands point at 3:15. There doesn't seem to be anything else of interest here.
